channel.title: Comments on: George Michael to “play” sex-crazed stoner in ‘Extras’

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: "If you didnâ€t know all along that George Michael was gay, youâ€re gay." Classic. Really, how was it not obvious to everyone? I mean, just look at the lyrics to "Wake Me Up Before You Go Go." Case in point: <i>Wake me up before you go go / And take me dancing tonight.</i> Notice the phrase structure: "Take <i>me</i> dancing tonight." Now, not being of the dance scene, this reads as if Georgie Porgie is looking for a sugar daddy to take him to the club, after which he will reward his newfound benefactor with, as you said, 'ric, "brown starfish explorations." So not only is Georgie Boy a nonce, he's a bottom as well. And that we just can't abide.
item.content:encoded:
“If you didnâ€™t know all along that George Michael was gay, youâ€™re gay.” Classic.

Really, how was it not obvious to everyone? I mean, just look at the lyrics to “Wake Me Up Before You Go Go.” Case in point:

Wake me up before you go go / And take me dancing tonight.

Notice the phrase structure: “Take me dancing tonight.” Now, not being of the dance scene, this reads as if Georgie Porgie is looking for a sugar daddy to take him to the club, after which he will reward his newfound benefactor with, as you said, ‘ric, “brown starfish explorations.” So not only is Georgie Boy a nonce, he’s a bottom as well.

And that we just can’t abide.
